export const useRequest = (url) => {
  const loading = ref(false);
  const data = ref({});
  const error = ref(null);
  const request = async () => {
    try {
      loading.value = true;
      data.value = await axios.get(url);
    } catch (e) {
      error.value = e;
    }
    loading.value = false;
  }
  onMounted(request);

  return {
    loading,
    data,
    error
